channel.title: Word problem
channel.description: tyou earn 9$ per hour on major holidays such as thanksgiving you earn twice as much per hour you earna total of 405$ for the week including thanksgiving.write and solve and equation to find how many hours you worked on thanksgiviing if you worked 35 hours during the rest of the week

item.title: Word problem
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

(359) + (a18)=405
315 + 18a=405
18a= 90
a=5
where a equals the amount of hours worked on thanksgiving.

5 hours on thanksgiving
